data.content:
Evelynn: The Widowmaker

Release Date: May 1, 2009

Evelynn, also known as the Widowmaker, is a seductive and deadly assassin in the popular online game League of Legends. With her mysterious and alluring persona, she strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies, lurking in the shadows and striking when they least expect it. In this article, we will delve into Evelynn's story, her strengths and weaknesses, her background in the game, and her significant place in the League of Legends universe.

Background Story

Evelynn's origins are shrouded in darkness, much like her own existence. She is a demon from the Shadow Isles, a cursed land filled with malevolent spirits and haunting creatures. Once a human, Evelynn was consumed by her own desires and transformed into a demonic being, forever cursed to roam the world as a predator.

Driven by her insatiable hunger for pain and suffering, Evelynn revels in the torment of her victims. She thrives on the fear she instills in others, using her seductive charm to lure unsuspecting prey into her clutches. With her demonic powers and unparalleled stealth, she is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Evelynn possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make her a formidable assassin in the game. Her greatest strength lies in her ability to remain hidden from enemy vision, thanks to her passive ability, Demon Shade. This allows her to move undetected through the map, making her an excellent roamer and ganker.

Additionally, Evelynn's Q ability, Hate Spike, allows her to deal damage to multiple enemies in a cone-shaped area, making her a potent threat in team fights. Her W ability, Allure, is a powerful tool for engaging or disengaging from fights, as it charms the target and slows them down, giving Evelynn the upper hand.

However, Evelynn also has her fair share of weaknesses. Her early game can be quite challenging, as she lacks the burst damage of other assassins. She heavily relies on her ultimate ability, Last Caress, to secure kills and escape dangerous situations. Additionally, she is quite squishy and vulnerable to crowd control effects, making her an easy target if caught off guard.

Evelynn in the Game

Evelynn's unique playstyle and abilities make her a popular pick among players who enjoy the thrill of stealth and surprise. She excels at picking off isolated targets and disrupting the enemy team's positioning. Her ability to move undetected allows her to create chaos and confusion, making her a nightmare for squishy carries and unsuspecting foes.

In the early game, Evelynn focuses on farming and gaining experience to unlock her core abilities. Once she reaches level 6 and obtains her ultimate ability, she becomes a potent threat on the map. Her ganking potential is unparalleled, as she can quickly traverse the map and catch enemies off guard with her burst damage.

As the game progresses, Evelynn transitions into a powerful assassin who excels at eliminating priority targets. Her ability to flank and assassinate squishy carries can turn the tide of team fights in her team's favor. However, she must always be mindful of her positioning and timing, as a mistimed engage can lead to her demise.

Skins

Evelynn has a variety of stunning skins that allow players to customize her appearance in the game. On our website, you can access information and videos showcasing all of Evelynn's skins, including:

  • Shadow Evelynn
  • Masquerade Evelynn
  • Blood Moon Evelynn
  • K/DA Evelynn
  • Prestige K/DA Evelynn

Each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience, allowing players to express their personal style while playing as Evelynn.

In conclusion, Evelynn is a seductive and deadly assassin who strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. With her mysterious origins, unique playstyle, and powerful abilities, she has carved a significant place for herself in the League of Legends universe. Whether you're a fan of stealthy gameplay or enjoy the thrill of surprising your opponents, Evelynn is a champion worth mastering.

Evelynn (Masquerade Evelynn)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 29, 2020

Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her ability to charm and assassinate her enemies, Evelynn has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing stealthy and deceptive characters. With her latest skin, Masquerade Evelynn, she takes on a new persona that is both alluring and mysterious.

Masquerade Evelynn is a skin that was released on October 29, 2020, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin transforms Evelynn into a captivating masquerade attendee, ready to charm and deceive her enemies with her elegant and seductive appearance.

The costume features a stunning black and gold color scheme, with intricate details that give it a regal and mysterious feel. Evelynn's outfit is adorned with feathers, lace, and jewels, adding to the overall elegance of the skin. Her hair is styled in an elaborate updo, complete with a masquerade mask that conceals her true identity.

One of the standout features of Masquerade Evelynn is her unique ability effects. Her abilities are transformed into mesmerizing displays of dark magic, with swirling gold particles and enchanting animations. The skin also includes new sound effects, adding to the immersive experience of playing as this alluring champion.

As a champion, Evelynn has a rich backstory that adds depth to her character. She is a demon from the Shadow Isles, cursed to forever crave the pain and suffering of others. Evelynn revels in the agony she inflicts upon her victims, using her seductive charm to lure them into her grasp before delivering a swift and deadly strike.

In the game, Evelynn is classified as an assassin, specializing in quickly eliminating high-priority targets. Her passive ability, Demon Shade, allows her to become camouflaged when out of combat, making her invisible to enemy champions unless they are within close proximity. This ability gives Evelynn the element of surprise, allowing her to strike when her enemies least expect it.

Evelynn's Q ability, Hate Spike, allows her to unleash a flurry of spikes in a target direction, damaging all enemies hit. This ability can be used to quickly clear minion waves or poke at enemy champions from a safe distance.

Her W ability, Allure, is a charm that she can use to seduce an enemy champion, causing them to walk towards her. This ability is a powerful tool for setting up kills or escaping dangerous situations, as it temporarily immobilizes the target and leaves them vulnerable to Evelynn's attacks.

Evelynn's E ability, Whiplash, is a lash of her demonic whip that deals damage to a target enemy. If the target is below a certain health threshold, Whiplash deals additional damage and refunds a portion of its cooldown, allowing Evelynn to quickly chain her abilities and finish off low-health targets.

Finally, Evelynn's ultimate ability, Last Caress, is a devastating burst of damage that she can use to finish off her enemies. She dashes to a target location, dealing damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival. This ability can be used to initiate team fights or secure kills on fleeing enemies.

Evelynn's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down squishy targets and her ability to roam and gank other lanes. Her stealth and charm abilities make her a formidable opponent, as she can catch her enemies off guard and quickly eliminate them before they have a chance to react.

However, Evelynn also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making her vulnerable in extended fights. Additionally, she relies heavily on her stealth and charm abilities to engage and disengage, so champions with abilities that reveal or disable her can be a significant threat.

In conclusion, Masquerade Evelynn is a visually stunning skin that adds a touch of elegance and mystery to the champion. With its intricate details, unique ability effects, and captivating design, this skin is a must-have for fans of Evelynn and those who enjoy playing as stealthy and deceptive assassins.

For more information about Evelynn and to see all of her appearances in the game, including Masquerade Evelynn, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this seductive champion.

Evelynn (Default)

RP Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Evelynn, the Widowmaker, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her stealth and assassination abilities, Evelynn strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. Her default skin is the original appearance of the champion, representing her true form before she unleashes her demonic powers.

Details of the Costume

Evelynn's default skin showcases her as a mysterious and alluring character. She has a slender and graceful figure, with long flowing hair that cascades down her back. Her skin is a pale blue, giving her an otherworldly appearance. She wears a revealing black outfit, accentuating her seductive nature. Her eyes glow with a haunting yellow hue, adding to her eerie charm.

As a demon assassin, Evelynn wields a wicked-looking blade, which she uses to strike down her unsuspecting victims. Her movements are swift and graceful, allowing her to navigate the battlefield with ease. Her abilities are enhanced by her demonic powers, making her a formidable opponent.

Evelynn's Story

Evelynn's story is shrouded in darkness and mystery. She is a demon from the Shadow Isles, a cursed land filled with malevolent spirits. Once a human, Evelynn made a pact with the demons of the Shadow Isles, trading her soul for power. As a result, she was transformed into a demon and gained the ability to manipulate shadows and become invisible.

Evelynn's past is a tragic one. She was once a beautiful woman who fell victim to the cruelty of men. Seeking revenge, she made a deal with the demons, becoming a predator herself. Now, she roams the Summoner's Rift, hunting down her prey and reveling in their fear and suffering.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Evelynn's strengths lie in her ability to assassinate targets quickly and efficiently. Her stealth allows her to sneak up on unsuspecting enemies, dealing massive damage before they even have a chance to react. Her ultimate ability, "Last Caress," deals a significant amount of damage to all nearby enemies, making her a threat in team fights.

However, Evelynn also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks crowd control abilities, making her vulnerable to crowd control effects and burst damage. Additionally, her stealth is countered by vision wards and control wards, which can reveal her presence and make her an easy target.

Evelynn in the Game

Evelynn is a popular pick in the jungle role, thanks to her stealth and assassination potential. Her ability to gank lanes from unexpected angles makes her a nightmare for enemy laners. She excels at picking off isolated targets and creating chaos in team fights.

Her playstyle revolves around map control and objective control. Evelynn players must be strategic in their positioning and timing, using their stealth to their advantage. Proper vision control is crucial for Evelynn, as it allows her to navigate the map undetected and set up successful ganks.

Explore Evelynn's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Evelynn's appearances in League of Legends. From her default skin to her various alternate skins, you can witness the evolution of this seductive demon assassin. Whether you prefer her classic look or want to explore her more extravagant skins, this page has it all.

Evelynn (K/DA Evelynn)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 3, 2018

Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her ability to charm and assassinate her enemies, Evelynn has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing stealthy and elusive champions. With her K/DA Evelynn skin, she takes on a whole new persona, joining the ranks of the virtual K-pop group K/DA.

The K/DA Evelynn skin was released on November 3, 2018, as part of the K/DA skin line, which features alternate versions of popular champions dressed as members of the virtual K-pop group. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers players a chance to experience Evelynn in a whole new light, with stunning visuals and unique animations.

Details of the Costume

K/DA Evelynn is a visually striking skin that captures the essence of the K-pop aesthetic. She is dressed in a sleek black outfit with gold accents, giving her a glamorous and stylish appearance. Her hair is a vibrant shade of pink, matching the color scheme of the K/DA group. The skin also features new particle effects, sound effects, and recall animation, all designed to enhance the player's experience.

One of the standout features of the K/DA Evelynn skin is her ability to transform into a sleek sports car during her ultimate ability, "Last Caress." This transformation adds an extra layer of excitement and style to her gameplay, making her feel even more powerful and deadly.

Overall, the K/DA Evelynn skin is a must-have for fans of both Evelynn and the K/DA group. It offers a fresh and unique take on the champion, allowing players to immerse themselves in the world of K-pop while enjoying the thrill of playing as Evelynn.

Evelynn's Story and Gameplay

Evelynn is a champion with a dark and mysterious past. She is a demon from the Shadow Isles, known for her insatiable hunger for human emotions. Evelynn thrives on the pain and suffering of others, using her seductive charm to lure unsuspecting victims into her grasp.

In the game, Evelynn is classified as an assassin, specializing in quickly eliminating high-priority targets. Her passive ability, "Determined Killer," allows her to deal bonus magic damage to enemies below a certain health threshold. This makes her particularly deadly when engaging weakened opponents.

Evelynn's Q ability, "Hate Spike," allows her to unleash a flurry of spikes in a target direction, damaging all enemies hit. This ability is great for clearing minion waves and harassing enemy champions in the early game.

Her W ability, "Allure," is what sets Evelynn apart from other champions. When activated, Evelynn becomes camouflaged, making her invisible to enemy champions unless she gets too close. This ability allows her to sneak up on unsuspecting enemies and catch them off guard, making her a formidable threat in the hands of a skilled player.

Evelynn's E ability, "Whiplash," is a targeted dash that deals damage to the target and applies on-hit effects. This ability is great for closing the gap between Evelynn and her target, allowing her to quickly burst them down with her other abilities.

Finally, Evelynn's ultimate ability, "Last Caress," is a devastating burst of damage that deals magic damage to all enemies in a large area. This ability can be used to finish off low-health enemies or turn the tide of team fights, making Evelynn a force to be reckoned with in the late game.

Evelynn's playstyle revolves around stealth and deception. She excels at catching enemies off guard and quickly eliminating them before they have a chance to react. However, she is relatively squishy and relies on her stealth to survive. If caught out of position or revealed by enemy abilities, Evelynn can be easily taken down.

In terms of lore, Evelynn's story is intertwined with the Shadow Isles and the champions who inhabit it. She is a demon who revels in the suffering of others, constantly seeking out new victims to satisfy her insatiable hunger. Her past is shrouded in mystery, and her true form remains a terrifying secret.

As a champion, Evelynn has found her place in the game as a high-risk, high-reward assassin. Her ability to sneak up on enemies and quickly burst them down makes her a formidable threat in the hands of skilled players. However, she requires careful positioning and timing to be effective, as she is easily punished if caught out of position.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Evelynn's appearances, including the K/DA Evelynn skin. Whether you're a fan of her seductive charm or enjoy playing stealthy assassins, Evelynn offers a unique and thrilling gameplay experience in the world of League of Legends.

Evelynn (Tango Evelynn)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2011

Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her stealth and assassination abilities, Evelynn strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. With her Tango Evelynn skin, she takes on a new persona, embracing the elegance and passion of the tango.

Tango Evelynn is a visually stunning skin that transforms Evelynn into a sultry tango dancer. Her outfit features a vibrant red dress with intricate black lace details, accentuating her curves and adding a touch of mystery. Her hair is styled in a sleek updo, adorned with a red rose, and her eyes are smoky and alluring. The skin also includes new particle effects, such as red roses swirling around her as she moves and dances.

Released on November 29, 2011, Tango Evelynn quickly became a fan favorite. The skin perfectly captures the essence of the tango, combining elegance, passion, and danger. It adds a new layer of depth to Evelynn's character, showcasing her seductive nature in a unique and captivating way.

Now, let's delve into the story of Evelynn herself. As one of the original champions in League of Legends, Evelynn has a rich history within the game. She is a demon from the Shadow Isles, a realm of darkness and despair. Evelynn thrives on the suffering of others, feeding off their pain and torment.

In the game, Evelynn is classified as an assassin, specializing in stealth and burst damage. Her passive ability, Demon Shade, allows her to become camouflaged when out of combat, making her invisible to enemy champions unless they come within close proximity. This ability gives her a unique advantage, allowing her to surprise and ambush her enemies.

Evelynn's Q ability, Hate Spike, allows her to unleash a flurry of spikes in a cone in front of her, damaging all enemies hit. This ability is her main source of damage and can be devastating when used in combination with her other abilities.

Her W ability, Allure, is a charm that she can use to seduce her enemies. When activated, Evelynn gains movement speed and causes her next basic attack or ability to charm the target, making them walk towards her. This ability is perfect for setting up kills or escaping dangerous situations.

Evelynn's E ability, Whiplash, is a targeted dash that deals damage to the target and applies on-hit effects. This ability allows her to quickly close the gap between her and her enemies, ensuring that they have nowhere to run.

Finally, Evelynn's ultimate ability, Last Caress, is a devastating burst of damage that deals damage to all enemies in a large area around her. This ability can turn the tide of team fights and is especially deadly when combined with her other abilities.

Evelynn's strengths lie in her ability to surprise and assassinate her enemies. Her stealth allows her to roam the map undetected, making her a constant threat to squishy targets. Her burst damage is unmatched, and she can quickly eliminate priority targets before they have a chance to react.

However, Evelynn also has her weaknesses. She is quite squishy and lacks sustained damage, making her vulnerable in extended fights. Additionally, she heavily relies on her stealth to engage and disengage, so champions with true sight or crowd control can easily shut her down.

In the lore of League of Legends, Evelynn is a feared and powerful demon. She revels in the pain and suffering of others, using her seductive nature to lure in unsuspecting victims. Her Tango Evelynn skin captures this essence perfectly, showcasing her elegance and danger in a mesmerizing dance.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Evelynn's appearances, including her Tango Evelynn skin. Whether you're a fan of the tango or simply appreciate the beauty of this skin, Tango Evelynn is a must-have for any Evelynn player.

Evelynn (Sugar Rush Evelynn)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 1, 2018

Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her ability to charm and assassinate her enemies, Evelynn has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing stealthy and deceptive characters. With her latest skin, Sugar Rush Evelynn, she takes on a sweet and playful appearance that is sure to captivate both her allies and enemies on the battlefield.

Sugar Rush Evelynn is a delightful and whimsical skin that transforms Evelynn into a candy-themed temptress. With vibrant colors and sugary details, this skin brings a whole new level of charm to the champion. Her outfit is adorned with candy canes, lollipops, and other sweet treats, giving her a playful and mischievous look. Her abilities also receive a sugary makeover, with candy-themed effects that add a touch of sweetness to her deadly arsenal.

One of the standout features of Sugar Rush Evelynn is her recall animation. When Evelynn recalls, she is enveloped in a giant candy wrapper and is lifted into the air by a candy cane. It's a whimsical and fun animation that perfectly captures the playful nature of the skin.

Now, let's delve into the story of Evelynn and how she fits into the world of League of Legends. Evelynn is a demon from the Shadow Isles, a dark and mysterious realm filled with malevolent spirits. She is a creature of pure agony, feeding off the pain and suffering of others. With her seductive charm, she lures unsuspecting victims into her grasp, reveling in their torment.

In the game, Evelynn is classified as an assassin, specializing in quickly eliminating high-priority targets. Her passive ability, Demon Shade, allows her to become camouflaged when out of combat, making her a formidable threat in the shadows. Her Q ability, Hate Spike, allows her to unleash a flurry of spikes that damage all enemies in their path. Her W ability, Allure, charms an enemy champion, making them vulnerable to her attacks. Her E ability, Whiplash, allows her to lash out with her lashers, dealing damage and applying on-hit effects. Finally, her ultimate ability, Last Caress, teleports her behind a target and deals massive damage, often securing a kill.

Evelynn's strengths lie in her ability to surprise and assassinate her enemies. With her camouflage and charm, she can catch opponents off guard and quickly dispatch them before they have a chance to react. Her burst damage is incredibly high, making her a threat to squishy targets. However, Evelynn is also quite fragile herself, lacking in durability and sustain. She relies on her stealth and burst damage to secure kills, but if caught out of position or focused by multiple enemies, she can easily be taken down.

In the lore of League of Legends, Evelynn has a dark and twisted past. She was once a human, but her desire for power led her to make a pact with a demon. In exchange for her soul, she gained immortality and the ability to feed off the pain of others. Now, she roams the world, seeking out victims to satisfy her insatiable hunger for agony.

If you're interested in learning more about Evelynn and her various appearances in the game, you can find information and videos on the official League of Legends website. Whether you prefer her classic look or the playful charm of Sugar Rush Evelynn, there's no denying that Evelynn is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

So, embrace the darkness and unleash your inner demon with Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace!

Evelynn (Prestige K/DA Evelynn)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points | Release Date: November 3, 2018

Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her ability to charm and assassinate her enemies, Evelynn has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing stealthy and high burst damage champions. With the release of the K/DA skin line, Evelynn received a prestigious makeover in the form of the "Prestige K/DA Evelynn" skin.

The Prestige K/DA Evelynn skin is a limited edition skin that was released on November 3, 2018. It is a part of the K/DA skin line, which features the champions Ahri, Akali, Kai'Sa, and Evelynn as members of a virtual K-pop group. The Prestige edition of the skin is a special variant that offers unique visual effects and a golden color scheme, making it a highly sought-after cosmetic item.

As with all Prestige skins, the Prestige K/DA Evelynn skin can only be obtained through the use of Prestige Points. These points are earned by participating in special events and completing missions within the game. Once enough Prestige Points have been accumulated, players can exchange them for the Prestige K/DA Evelynn skin, adding a touch of exclusivity to their champion's appearance.

The Prestige K/DA Evelynn skin features a stunning golden outfit that perfectly captures the essence of the K/DA aesthetic. Evelynn's usual dark and mysterious appearance is replaced with a glamorous and flashy look, complete with golden armor, a sleek bodysuit, and intricate details that showcase her status as a member of the K/DA group.

In addition to the visual changes, the Prestige K/DA Evelynn skin also includes unique sound effects and animations. Her abilities are enhanced with golden particles and shimmering effects, making her attacks and movements even more captivating. The skin truly embodies the spirit of K/DA, bringing a touch of elegance and style to Evelynn's gameplay.

Now, let's delve into the story of Evelynn and her place in the League of Legends universe. Evelynn is a demon from the Shadow Isles, a dark and cursed land filled with malevolent spirits. She is a creature of desire, feeding off the pain and suffering of others. With her seductive charm and deadly abilities, Evelynn lures her victims into a false sense of security before striking them down.

Evelynn's past in the game is shrouded in mystery. She was once a human, but her insatiable hunger for power led her to make a pact with a demon. This pact transformed her into the demon she is today, granting her immortality and the ability to manipulate shadows. Now, she roams the world, seeking out those who succumb to their darkest desires.

In the game, Evelynn is classified as an assassin, specializing in burst damage and high mobility. Her passive ability, Demon Shade, allows her to become camouflaged when out of combat, making her a formidable threat in the jungle or when roaming the map. Her Q ability, Hate Spike, allows her to throw spikes at multiple enemies, dealing damage and applying on-hit effects.

Evelynn's W ability, Allure, is her signature charm ability. She seduces an enemy champion, slowing them and dealing damage over time. This ability is crucial for setting up kills and catching opponents off guard. Her E ability, Whiplash, is a dash that deals damage and applies on-hit effects. It allows Evelynn to quickly close the gap between her and her target, making it an essential tool for assassinations.

Finally, Evelynn's ultimate ability, Last Caress, is a devastating burst of damage that deals damage to all enemies in a large area. It also grants her a shield, allowing her to survive in the midst of battle. With her combination of stealth, charm, and burst damage, Evelynn is a force to be reckoned with on the Summoner's Rift.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Evelynn's appearances in the game, including her base skin and other cosmetic variants. Whether you're a fan of her seductive charm or her deadly assassin playstyle, Evelynn offers a unique and thrilling experience for players who dare to embrace the darkness.

Evelynn (Blood Moon Evelynn)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: February 8, 2018

Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her ability to infiltrate the shadows and strike fear into the hearts of her enemies, Evelynn has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing stealthy and elusive characters. One of her most captivating skins is the "Blood Moon Evelynn" costume, which adds a dark and mysterious twist to her already alluring persona.

The "Blood Moon Evelynn" skin was released on February 8, 2018, and quickly became a hit among players. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a unique and visually stunning look for Evelynn, transforming her into a fearsome and otherworldly creature. The skin features a striking red and black color scheme, with intricate details and animations that bring the Blood Moon theme to life.

One of the standout features of the "Blood Moon Evelynn" skin is the elaborate headdress that adorns her head. With its sharp, curved horns and flowing red fabric, the headdress adds an air of mystique and danger to Evelynn's appearance. Her outfit is also adorned with intricate patterns and symbols, further emphasizing her connection to the Blood Moon cult.

In addition to the visual enhancements, the "Blood Moon Evelynn" skin also includes unique sound effects and voice lines. When using her abilities, Evelynn emits a haunting and ethereal sound, adding to the overall immersive experience of playing with this skin. Her voice lines are also modified to reflect the dark and sinister nature of the Blood Moon cult, further enhancing the thematic elements of the skin.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story behind Evelynn and how she fits into the world of League of Legends. Evelynn is a demon from the Shadow Isles, a cursed land filled with darkness and malevolence. She is a member of the demon race known as the Agony's Embrace, who thrive on the pain and suffering of others.

Evelynn's past is shrouded in mystery, as she is a creature of the shadows who revels in chaos and deception. She is known for her insatiable hunger for human emotions, particularly pain and despair. In the game, Evelynn's abilities revolve around her ability to charm and seduce her enemies, luring them into her grasp before striking them down with her deadly claws.

As a champion, Evelynn excels at ambushing unsuspecting enemies and picking off isolated targets. Her passive ability, Demon Shade, allows her to become camouflaged when out of combat, making her a formidable threat in the jungle or when roaming the map. Her Q ability, Hate Spike, allows her to deal damage to multiple enemies in a cone, while her W ability, Allure, charms and slows enemies, leaving them vulnerable to her attacks.

Evelynn's ultimate ability, Last Caress, is a devastating burst of damage that can quickly eliminate low-health targets. This ability also grants her a shield, allowing her to survive in the midst of battle. However, Evelynn's strength lies in her ability to remain hidden and strike when her enemies least expect it. She is a champion that requires patience and careful positioning to maximize her effectiveness.

In the world of League of Legends, Evelynn is a champion that embodies the allure of darkness and the thrill of the hunt. Her seductive and deadly nature makes her a popular choice among players who enjoy playing stealthy and deceptive characters. With the "Blood Moon Evelynn" skin, players can further immerse themselves in the dark and mysterious world of Evelynn, embracing the power of the Blood Moon cult.

For more information about Evelynn and to see all of her appearances and abilities in action, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this captivating champion. Watch videos, read guides, and discover the secrets of the Agony's Embrace. Whether you choose to embrace the shadows or stand against them, Evelynn is a champion that will leave a lasting impression on the battlefield.

Evelynn (Coven Evelynn)

RP Cost: 1350 | Release Date: October 29, 2020

Evelynn, the Agony's Embrace, is a seductive and deadly champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her ability to charm and assassinate her enemies, Evelynn has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing stealthy and elusive characters. With her latest skin, Coven Evelynn, players can now experience a darker and more mysterious side of this enchanting champion.

Coven Evelynn is a part of the Coven skin line, which features champions who have been corrupted by dark magic and have joined a coven of witches. Released on October 29, 2020, this skin offers a unique and visually stunning look for Evelynn, transforming her into a powerful witch with a touch of darkness.

The Coven Evelynn skin introduces a new color palette and design elements that perfectly capture the essence of a witch. Her outfit is adorned with intricate patterns and symbols, and her hair is styled in a flowing and ethereal manner. The skin also features new visual effects, including spell animations and particle effects, which add an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

One of the standout features of the Coven Evelynn skin is the attention to detail in her abilities. Each of her skills has been reimagined to fit the theme of a witch, making them visually distinct and thematically consistent. For example, her Q ability, Hate Spike, now appears as a swirling vortex of dark energy, while her ultimate ability, Last Caress, creates a dramatic explosion of dark magic upon impact.

Aside from the visual enhancements, the Coven Evelynn skin also offers new voice lines and interactions, further immersing players into the world of the Coven. Evelynn's voice takes on a more sinister and commanding tone, reflecting her newfound power as a witch. These additions add depth to the character and make playing as Coven Evelynn a truly captivating experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Evelynn and her place in the League of Legends universe. Evelynn is a demon who thrives on the pain and suffering of others.
